TextView.android:text: This Game was developed as 12'th grade project by Yakov Mashin in Amit Karmiel School, Israel.

The game is a quiz that for 28.08.2022 has three main categories : History, Programming and Technology. Each category consists of the levels that differ in difficulty: Beginner, Professional and World Class. After choosing the level you will be asked some questions on that matter and gain points if you answer correctly. After answering correctly five questions in a row you will be granted double points! Remember, there is a time limit and if the time is up, you lose! Enjoy the game!
The source code can be viewed on GitHub: https://github.com/YakovMashin/QuizApp
